Class GeometryDrawingProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeometryDrawingProgram

  • public class GeometryDrawingProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    [GeometryDrawingProgram.java] The program allows the user to add shapes, remove shapes, translate shapes and save and load files on to a cartesian plane. The user interacts with the program through the console and inputs the necessary information of the shape in order to draw it. The user will be told exactly what to input to the console. The program also displays the shapes added on to a graphics panel that can be seen by the user.
    Version:
    1.0, Oct 9, 2020
    Author:
    Braydon Wang

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GeometryDrawingProgram.GeometryScreen
      The class is an inner class of GeometryDrawingProgram that creates the screen that the shapes are drawn in.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • checkNegDimension

        static int checkNegDimension()
        This method checks if the inputted dimension for any shape is a positive number. It continuously requests for input until the user provides a valid dimension.
        Returns:
        the valid inputted dimension

      • checkParallelogram

        static void checkParallelogram(int height,
                               int side)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method checks if the inputted dimension for rhombuses or parallelograms are valid. It throws a DimensionException if the input is not valid.
        Parameters:
        height - the height of the shape
        side - the side length of the shape
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • validateOption

        static int validateOption(int start,
                          int end)
        This method takes input from the user and checks if the input lies within the options available. Once a valid input is found, the method returns it.
        Parameters:
        start - the first number in the options available
        end - the last number in the options available
        Returns:
        the valid input option

      • listShapes

        static void listShapes()
        This method prints all of the data of the shapes that are currently on the grid. It lists the shapes type, coordinates, area and perimeter.
